Posts.Content: me too how weird is it that when at work we allmoan about it but now we are desperate to get back like you missed all the children was soo looking forward to my year 1 class as i had been with them when they were nursery children but they will be there waiting next year when i go back cant wait I am getting the flu jab on 29 along with my family it was recommeneded do look into it it has to be worht it to stop getting any thing else to drag us down this is hard enough   caz  x very jealous you are going back to work
Posts.Title: Might be going back to work :)

Posts.Title: Might be going back to work :)

Posts.Content: If you get this before you go i to hospital remeber you are in good hands and everything will be ok you will be a bit sore and uncomfortable but trust me it will ease but dont rush yourself if you are not ready do not leave hospital when home do take it easy let others do for you please it really will help your recovery.   Caz  x
Posts.Title: mysectomy and reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi I had the same done on 27th July was hard work but all ok stayed in 1 week as i didnt want to go home with any drips coming out of me, you will be fine all healed ok just make sure you dont do anything for the 6 weeks best of staying in for the week get some hold it all in knickers they are great and better than the big bandage thing they give you.  Nice to have a flat tummy my god people pay good money for what we had done!!!! Caz  x
